name: Aughild's Power
flavorText: Aughild was the only warlord to successfully lay siege to Entsteig. But, in the end, it proved to be his undoing.
flavorTextHtml: Aughild was the only warlord to successfully lay siege to Entsteig. But, in the end, it proved to be his undoing.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Reduces damage taken by 15%.    
 Increases damage dealt by 30%.(3) Set:     
 Reduces damage from elites by 30.0%    
 Increases damage against elites by 30.0%
